welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kashiwa, a charming city known for its rich history, beautiful parks, and traditional Japanese culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Kashiwa has to offer during your visit with us.

restaurants.name: 天ぷらめし 天之助
restaurants.description: 天ぷらめし 天之助 is a tempura restaurant located in 柏市.

restaurants.name: Kurumaya Ramen (くるまやラーメン 柏大津ヶ丘店)
restaurants.description: Kurumaya Ramen (くるまやラーメン 柏大津ヶ丘店) is a ramen restaurant located in 柏市.

restaurants.name: Yoshioka Sabou (吉岡茶房)
restaurants.description: Yoshioka Sabou (吉岡茶房) is a café located in 我孫子市.

restaurants.name: Teraccho (てらっちょ。)
restaurants.description: Teraccho (てらっちょ。) is a ramen restaurant located in 我孫子市.

restaurants.name: Backstube Zopf
restaurants.description: Backstube Zopf is a bakery located in 松戸市.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Narita International Airport, serving international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Narita International Airport, serving international and domestic flights for multiple airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Narita International Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers for both international and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, but a registration is required.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Haneda Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal of Haneda Airport, mainly serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network by registering with a valid email address.
